metadata.title: CVE-2023-28755 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
A ReDoS issue was discovered in the URI component through 0.12.0 in Rubythrough 3.2.1. The URI parser mishandles invalid URLs that have specificcharacters. It causes an increase in execution time for parsing strings toURI objects. The fixed versions are 0.12.1, 0.11.1, 0.10.2 and 0.10.0.1.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-28755` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libruby2.7 - 2.7.0-5ubuntu1.11
ruby2.7 - 2.7.0-5ubuntu1.11
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ruby2.7 package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.7.0-5ubuntu1.11').
jruby package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
